mapper.select: SELECT user_no userNo, id, password, name, nick_name nickName, hp, email, address, manager FROM users WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{password}
SELECT user_no userNo, id, password, name, nick_name nickName, hp, email, address, manager FROM users WHERE user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT orders.order_no orderNo, orders.order_date orderDate, product.product_name productName, product.price, colors.color FROM orders JOIN orderlist ON orders.order_no = orderlist.order_no JOIN product ON orderlist.product_no = product.product_no LEFT JOIN colors ON orderlist.color_no = colors.no WHERE orders.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderlist (order_no orderNo, product_no productNo, count, color_no colorNo) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{productNo}, #{count}, #{colorNo});
